content:
"Oh this?" He gestures to the incomplete piece. "Something about the duality of the prey-predator relationship, I think. Or maybe just that there's always a bigger fish out there?" He laughs. "But I have to admit, I'd like a break to approach this with a fresh eye, and the Stoneweaver sculpture should get checked to make sure it's working correctly. Don't suppose you'd like to take me down there again?"

A) Agree to help. Discard all  , and attach the HELPING HAND mission to Tollin. Write APPRECIATED TOLLIN'S ART on the campaign tracker.

B) Not today. Discard Tollin. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
